Rodimus:

Rodimus sighed, it would be hard to explain. "If I would'n have s=
een this that I'll tell ya, I would be fidn to belive it" 

Rodimus started=
 to tell Silence about his wife and how when he told her that his dutties m=
ay risk his life to get back amemories from his past, that will help him to=
 defeat unicron, she fainted. He also told her about Vok's alliens and how =
they claimed Earth as their Lab in first BW.
After that, he ends his story =
with the revelation that somehow one of those alliens had taken posesion to=
 his beloved wife's body and that some scanners had revealed that Nighlight=
's signature has almost vanished but according with the allien her spark st=
ill was inside her, and she (The vork) asked to get a deal to free her, eit=
her let her act and stop Unicron or giving her a blank protophorm, He also =
added that for Nighlight's and MAximal's security, she had to remain in sta=
sis keeping that allien trapped there while he got a way to take out her th=
e vork. He and Kup had an idea  how bring her back.. but he would feel bett=
er knowing that someone else skilled as him, can help in the process.

"Tha=
t's all our story..."said the male with a sigh


--- Original Message -----=
 
  From: Dark Mouse 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Tuesday, April =
26, 2005 5:25 PM
  Subject: Re: Silence



  Silence::

  She looked down a=
nd sighed very softly. "Sir, I do not know. I think I
  might be, but I am =
not sure of all my skills. I do now I have an
  acceptible level, but I do =
not know if I have what you require. What
  exactly is the problem?"
